Okay, so I used the rich text editor to write the post and the link ends up=
 being written out twice.=A0 Mea culpa.=A0 The links are the same and both =
go to the same page.

            Admittedly,=
 I haven't spent much time with this yet, but thought I'd

pass it along to=
 those who are explorers at heart and, like me, can't

afford to fly across=
 the bigger pond to Japan.



I think Google may have this going for other =
cities in the world.  Well,

now they have it up for the Tokyo area, Kyoto/=
Osaka/ Kobe, Sendai,

Hakodate, Otaru & Sapporo.  The little camera icons o=
n the map show

where there are street views available.  Once you're on a s=
treet level

map, whenever you click on a point on that map, it'll take you=
 to that

point visually.



http://maps. google.com/ maps?f=3Dq& hl=3Den&g=
eocode=3D &q=3D&layer=3D c&ie=3DUTF8& ll=3D38.\

255436,138.713379& spn=3D8=
.605754, 16.962891& z=3D6
